//   ------------------------- ----- ----

//   SceneColorTexture         s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture        s1       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture        s2       1
//   RandomAngleTexture        s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.999000013, 1, 0.5, -2
    def c6, 1, -1, 0, 0.25
    def c16, 0.00039999999, -3.99959993, 0.699999988, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_3F72D63E_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r7, c220.z, s15
mov r8.xyw, v0
add r7.w, r8.w, -r7.y
mad r8.x, r7.w, r7.x, r8.x

    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r0, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r0.y, r8.w
      mad r0.x, r0.x, r0.y, r8.x
      mov r0.yz, r8.xyww
    else
      mov r0.xyz, r8.xyww
    endif
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r8.w
    mul r0.zw, r0.y, r8.xyxy
    mul r0.zw, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.w, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_3F72D63E_0.txt
add r7.w, r0.x, -r7.y
mad r0.z, -r7.w, r7.x, r0.z

    mad r1, c7, r0.z, r1
    mad r1, c9, r0.x, r1
    add r1, r1, c10
    rcp r0.x, r1.w
    mul r0.zw, r0.x, r1.xyxy
    min r2.z, r1.z, c5.x
    mad r1.zw, r8.xyxy, r0.y, c5.y
    mul r1.zw, r1, c0.xyxy
    mul r1.zw, r1, c5.z
    texld r3, r1.zwzw, s3
    mad_pp r3, r3.yxyx, -c5.w, -c5.y
    mul_pp r4, r3.wzwz, c6.xyxy
    mad r5, r4.zwzw, c13.xxzz, r0.zwzw
    mad_pp r5, r3.zwzw, c13.yyww, r5
    mul r2.xyw, r5.xyzx, c6.xxzz
    texldl_pp r6, r2, s2
    mul r2.xyw, r5.zwzx, c6.xxzz
    texldl r5, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.y, r5.x, r6.x
    mad r4, r4, c14.xxzz, r0.zwzw
    mad_pp r3, r3, c14.yyww, r4
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldl r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldl r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r3.x
    mul_pp r0.z, r0.y, c6.w
    add r0.w, -r0.y, c16.x
    add r0.y, r0.y, c16.y
    cmp r0.y, r0.y, c6.z, c6.x
    cmp r0.y, r0.w, c4.y, r0.y
    if_ne r0.y, -r0.y
      mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.x, c11
      mov_pp r2.xy, r3
      texldl_pp r4, r2, s2
      mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
      texldl r3, r2, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r3.x, r4.x
      mad_pp r1, r1.xyxy, r0.x, c12
      mov_pp r2.xy, r1
      texldl r3, r2, s2
      add_pp r0.x, r0.y, r3.x
      mov_pp r2.xy, r1.zwzw
      texldl r1, r2, s2
      add_pp r0.x, r0.x, r1.x
      mad r0.x, r0.x, c6.w, -r0.z
      mad_pp r0.z, r0.x, c16.z, r0.z
    endif
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.z, r0.z
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.z, r0.x
    mov r0.y, c5.y
    add_pp r1, r0.y, -c15
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r1, c15
